column4: For some reason the audio on my 12.10 system is garbled.  When this happened before in 12.04, it had to do with conflicting drivers. How can I check this to solve it?
It's the rm command, removing your config. Yes without those commands you'll have the same problem.

The rm command removes your configuration for PulseAudio, restarting will have Pulse start again, notice no config file and make a new one for you ( This is probably what will fix the problem or at least will be a good start, as ActionParsnip said :P )
